WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Team Leader Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 16:00 IST
 Water and Power Consultancy Services Limited
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 50,000 to 50,000




FOLLOW

The Water and Power Consultancy Services (WAPCOS) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Team Leader Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Team Leader 	01	B.E/ B.Tech in Electrical Engineering

Age Limit for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs 50,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Team Leader Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form.
Then, send the application form along with the CV and relevant documents to the address mentioned in the official notification.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	24-08-2025
Last Date of Application	31-08-2025

Official Notification	Click Here
